name: INSPARK Intelligent Business Solutions
description:
INSPARK is a software consultancy and software development (R&D) company that is founded in London in 1990 and started operating in Turkey in 1994. INSPARK completed successful projects using the world’s leader solutions like Salesforce.com CRM and Google Apps.
INSPARK offers value added consultancy services that covers all software requirements of an enterprise as well as selling it’s own cloud-based software solutions that are result of R&D investments to leader companies around the world.
 
INSPARK’s mission is to help companies to work more effectively and efficiently and to increase the quality of individual’s life. INSPARK works with world’s leading brands in specific industries such as Coca Cola, Sony, Pfizer, Peugeot, Shell, Diageo.  Besides Turkish market, INSPARK also works on projects in Europe, North Africa and Middle East. In addition to leading brands of the world, INSPARK supports non-profit organizations such as Educational Volunteers Foundation of Turkey (TEGV), İstanbul Modern Museum, Change.org, World Wide Fund for Nature (WWF). To its customers’ trust, INSPARK has achieved a fast growth and awarded in “Deloitte Technology Fast 50 Turkey” and “Deloitte Technology Fast 500 EMEA” lists in 2012, 2013 and 2014.
